# Pull Request

## Co zmienia ten PR?

Jasny opis w 1-2 zdaniach.

## Typ zmiany

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change)
- [ ] Breaking change (fix lub feature ktÃ³re zmienia existing functionality)
- [ ] Documentation update

- [ ] DodaÅ‚em/zaktualizowaÅ‚em testy
